Large Fey, Neutral Good
Also known as kytons, chain devils consider themselves morbid artisans
who use deception, menace, and vicious metal to coerce prisoners into
betraying themselves. Many serve powerful devils, wrenching secrets from
imprisoned souls using deadly, animate chains. Left to their own devices,
chain devils encourage ruthless individuals to pursue forbidden magic,
leading their pupils down paths to the Nine Hells.
Along with psychological threats and physical harm, a chain devil uses its
unnerving gaze to make its victims perceive their worst fear rather than the
monster. Roll on or choose a result from the Chain Devil Masks table to
inspire a chain devil’s fearful appearance.
Chain Devil Masks
1d4 	To a Viewer, the Chain Devil Looks Like...
1 	The corpse of a loved one.
2 	A disapproving deity.
3 	A harsh instructor or superior.
4 	The viewer at their lowest point in life.
